job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions working with LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) to create tools and features, which falls under the core definition of modeling with generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes building web applications with front-end and back-end integration, a clear indication of software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems' indicates software development work that bridges different parts of an application.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the integration of AI features within a larger product, a common aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the requirement for full-stack development, which is part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: Translating ideas into fully developed products using full-stack development aligns with software development responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership of the entire product lifecycle, from development to deployment and iteration, implies operational responsibilities for the AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: Owning the entire development process, including launching and iterating, encompasses operational aspects of managing and maintaining AI products.
Launching and iterating on products are key activities within MLOps for ensuring ongoing performance and improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights understanding the impact on students and meeting their needs, which requires business context for the educational technology domain.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on learner needs and pushing boundaries requires understanding the business and educational goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This directly addresses the business goal of accelerating learning outcomes and efficiency for students, requiring business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
Take ownership of the entire development process
Collaborate with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 and Claude, and creating autonomous tools and interactive features. It also requires integrating these AI capabilities into full-stack web applications, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
